answers.answer: Are you pregnant?Some women do gain weight quickly during pregnancy. Anyway, good that your Dr. is checking you out with the GTT.Let us know how you go.

question: I'm 24 yrs old 5'4, 134lb and in one month i gained 12 lbs.. my Dr said i should cut my carbohydrates.. I'll have gtt test next week.. now i changed my diet to low carbs n calories ... don't know if ill have trouble with gtt or no...
title: am i might have gestational diabetes ?
